extendedInfo.description: It can wait!  For your Safety and theirs, please keep your eyes on the road.Don't let your friends think you're just ignoring them because you choose to drive safely.  Tell them automatically you are safe texting, with your own custom text message.  Using the Safe Driving Text Machine texting app, your phone will automatically detect driving conditions and as soon as you receive a text message it will respond with your custom text message.  Allowing you to focus on what's important while you are on the road. Feature Highlights: * Respond to ALL text messages (driving or not). * Detect driving mode (driving or not). * Battery friendly. * Simple Home Screen Widget. * Notifications. * Uses incoming text messages to start, so doesn't use battery to run in background. * Adds automatic text messages to conversations (just like you sent the text normally).SETUP INFO FOR GOSMS, HANDCENT:-GO SMS -> Settings -> Advanced Tab -> Receive Settings -> uncheck "Disable other message notification"-HANDCENT -> Settings -> Application Settings -> Disable-Facebook Messenger -> Turn offFeel free to contact warezmystuff.jim@gmail.comTips for any Android app:Make sure to re-install before reporting problems.

reviews.title: No texting and driving
reviews.comment: Love this app! $aves me from using it while driving. I just type text and it sends a message for me =P
reviews.author: Kelly Banks

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Works like it\'s supposed to...a must for everyone!
reviews.author: Lisa Salas

reviews.title: I downloaded but didn\'t work.
reviews.comment: I downloaded it but It didn\'t work on Xperia Z.
reviews.author: JAWED ALAM

reviews.comment: App auto replies no matter what situation I am in. Its meant to run in the background, but since the sensitivity is broken, it requires constant toggling.\tDont bother with this.
reviews.author: David Klein

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t reply to texts at all. SG3
reviews.author: Vamp S

reviews.title: Works but...
reviews.comment: Really wish it worked with Google hangouts.
reviews.author: Tony MacDonald

reviews.title: Like it but have small problem
reviews.comment: I have trouble setting the speed for drive mode. It will send text when I am sitting or maybe when I pick up phone but doesn\'t send when I am in slow moving traffic. When I am slowing down for a red light or stop sign.
reviews.author: Janet Boyce

reviews.title: Sucks
reviews.comment: Didn\'t work on my phone
reviews.author: Carlos Lima

reviews.title: It works.
reviews.comment: Love it. It works like its suppose to n love the adjustable speed.
reviews.author: Tirsa Rodriguez

reviews.title: Galaxy s4
reviews.comment: Heres my issue,I have to keep my gps on for this to work on my device. So if my gps is on throughout the day, I will have no battery. Am I doing this wrong??
reviews.author: Jason Oyer

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: Even got my daughter to get it after she saw the response!
reviews.author: Tricia VanCantfort

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work at all !!!!!!
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work at all !!!!!!
reviews.author: Anthony G

reviews.comment: It works
reviews.author: James Stankowitz

reviews.comment: Didn\'t work
reviews.author: Tomas Garza

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work when FB Messenger used as SMS app
reviews.comment: If you enable using Facebook Messenger as your SMS application, which I like because of the new chat heads, the app does not appear to work.  As soon as I disabled that setting in FB Messenger, and let my native messaging app handle the SMS, the auto-reply began working.
reviews.author: Doug Williams

reviews.title: Can\'t stop notifications!
reviews.comment: For me the app works all the time, but i will continue to drop a star a week that the annoying notifications don\'t stop.  I gave it five stars with a comment and now it is always in my notifications asking me to rate it with a review. Next week it will be three stars if that doesn\'t stop.
reviews.author: Ken Szeplaki

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: I really like this app, it works the way it is supposed to. I also like how I can use it to respond to texts using a message a message that I created even when I am not driving.
reviews.author: Jacqie Monet

reviews.title: Review
reviews.comment: It\'s a nice idea. Allows people to know you\'re driving, therefore they should expect a delay in your text reply.  Unfortunately, it doesn\'t work very much of the time.
reviews.author: Peter Kerr

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Love this app... let\'s folks know you are not ignoring them, your are trying to stay safe...
reviews.author: Les Powell

reviews.title: Helpful
reviews.comment: Great idea! We should be texting less and driving more. Had no problems so far.
reviews.author: Marlisa Giacone
